mapper.select: SELECT s.location_id, s.shared_user_id, s.shared_at, l.location_nm, l.location_desc, u.username FROM shared_locations s INNER JOIN locations l ON s.location_id = l.location_id INNER JOIN users u ON s.shared_user_id = u.id ORDER BY s.shared_at DESC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM Shared_Locations WHERE location_id = #{locationId} AND shared_user_id = #{sharedUserId}
